citations.narrative:
There are accumulations of hair on the wire surfaces of the rabbit enclosures. Hair and debris accumulating on
enclosures can expose the animals to potential disease hazards. Enclosures must be kept reasonably free of hair and
debris by cleaning surfaces on a regular basis. Correct by March 22, 2023.
This inspection was conducted with a family member and the exit interview was conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
There are accumulations of hair on the wire surfaces of the rabbit enclosures. Hair and debris accumulating on 
enclosures can expose the animals to potential disease hazards. Enclosures must be kept reasonably free of hair and 
debris by cleaning surfaces on a regular basis. Correct by March 22, 2023. 
 
This inspection was conducted with a family member and the exit interview was conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
